citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:10 PM on
05/03/2016.
Spoke with the licensees mother in law who said she was gone for the afternoon. Left a business card with her.
